title: PERMABANNNN!!!
body: Pls Riot Games, for the community, for this game, Why don't permaban the players that go only suicide 1 vs 5 and you permaban the players that flaming other players that feeding everygames?? PLS PERMABAN THESE PLAYERS

replies.body: Ma la vera domanda è: Perché parlare in inglese (brutto) sapendo di essere nel forum italiano? Hmmmmmm

> [{quoted}](name=Dainsleif09,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=21I4Ta9F,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-28T23:03:33.270+0000)
>
> forse ha sbagliato forum ?

andrebbe permabannato per questo
direi di no:hanno smesso d'impiccare per il furto di una mela dal mercato tipo un bel po' di secoli fa'

...e lo vengo a sapere ora.
Dopo 1200 anni ?
:(

{{champion:26}}
eh leggi il giornale ed aggiornati ^^

> [{quoted}](name=lucanomax1994,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=21I4Ta9F,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-29T11:35:31.981+0000)
>
> Cause the game is for have fun, if you bring bad attitude and ruin experience you arent welcome.

Però anche i feeder/troll/afk rovinano l'esperienza per i giocatori, ma non vengono mai permabannati!
P.S I don't want flame anybody :)

Players in many cases won't be banned for just ONE thing.

Flamer - chat restrict (mute them)
Afk - leaverbuster (can't do nothing)
Feeder - just report them for bad attitude
Troll - they are here, deal with it and don't get mad. Neither give them any attention.

If you find mad people pinging like mad monkeys, you can adjust the volume in the audio settings menu.

Remember tbat asking for report is reportable, and premade reports count as ONE
